title: Screen saver issues
content:
I am having three screen saver issues.  I have colors selected and have it set to go on if docked or charging.  However, whenever I put the phone on the pixel stand, the clock automatically appears. 
Also, I have tried downloading screen savers from the Play store but cannot get them to appear as a choice of screen saver under settings.
Whenever my phone goes into sleep mode, the screen is blank,  no screen saver.
